doc:
Barry Brown (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barry_Brown_(actor) 0 Barry Brown (April 19, 1951 – June 25, 1978) was an American author, playwright and actor who performed on stage and in television dramas and feature films, notably as Frederick Winterbourne in Peter Bogdanovich's Daisy Miller (1974), adapted from the classic Henry James novella (1878). Bogdanovich praised Brown's contribution to the film, describing him as "the only American actor you can believe ever read a book." Barry_Brown ( April_19_,_1951 – June_25_,_1978 ) was an_American_author_,_playwright_and_actor who performed on stage and in television_dramas_and_feature_films , notably as Frederick_Winterbourne in Peter_Bogdanovich 's_Daisy_Miller ( 1974 ) , adapted from the_classic_Henry_James_novella ( 1878 ) . Bogdanovich praised Brown 's_contribution to the_film , describing him as " the_only_American_actor you can_believe ever read a_book .
